transform a ggplot with the DREAL theme

drealize.Rd

transform a ggplot with the DREAL theme

drealize(g, legend.position = "bottom", title = "Title of the graph",
  caption = "Source : DREAL", heights, widths, text.size = 12, ...)

Arguments

g

a ggplot
legend.position

position of the legend "bottom" or "right"
title

title of the graph
caption

cpation of the graph
heights

heights of the different parts of the plot. Default to c(1, 9, 1, 0.5) for legend.position = "bottom". Default to c(1, 9, 0.5) for legend.position = "left".
widths

widths of the two columns of plot with legend.position = "left". Default to c(4, 1).
text.size

main text size in pts.
...

other parameters of ggplot2::theme

Examples

library(ggplot2)
g <- ggplot(mtcars, aes(hp, mpg, colour = as.character(gear))) +
geom_point(
size = 4, alpha = .8) +
scale_color_dreal_d()

g2 <- drealize(g,
title = "Plot created with drealize()",
caption = "Source: DREAL",
legend.position = "bottom")

Contents

  • Arguments
  • Examples

drealthemes is a ThinkR package. Learn more at rtask.thinkr.fr.
